As a non-CS degree person, I find it difficult and overwhelmed when self-studying to become a software engineer. I was lucky enough to be guided by my senior, since then my studying process is much easier.
As a result, I start out this blog to share my programming journey; and I hope some of my articles help you in your journey as well.
My blog will mostly include but not limited to backend engineering.
